lines.text: [Nelson was embarrassed at the town meeting by Dexter]

Oh yeah, Dexter. Do yourself a favour. The next time you have this overwhelming urge to ejaculate some professional jealousy you may have towards me why don't you do it in the privacy of your own bathroom instead of a goddamn public forum! Because if it happens again, Dexter, I will do my very best to make sure you wake up the next morning without a profession!

[referring to Knickel]
Who is this bozo?
This *bozo* is Christ's representative on Earth, the Mayor of Town and the Acting Head of State of The Republic of Solomon Gundy, you little tit!
You're the mayor, right? August Nickle.
It's Augustus Knickel, actually. But you can call me Your Worship.
We heard your message. Now I say we give Ottawa a message they'll listen to for once! You works for them, right?
The government is my client, yes.
Your client. That's close enough, I figure. I say we hang him.
[the mob is attempting to hang Dexter Lexcannon]

[to Dexter]
You won't be lonesome, son, there's lots of politicians where you're going.
[the Islanders are welcoming the Russians to Solomon Gundy]
We'll haul away. We'll haul away together.
We'll haul away, we'll haul away Joe.
Well, Dexter came from Ottawa to stop us all from fishing...
We'll haul away, we'll haul away Joe.
But we'll go fishing anyway and we won't ask permission...
We'll haul away, we'll haul away Joe.
[Augustus and Noel are making out in the submarine]
I can't believe it. I'm inches away from a hydrogen bomb.
You flatter me!
[the prime Minister's phone has been ringing all day and is currently ringing]
If that's the Premier of Nova Scotia again, tell him I'm taking a dump. A long and pleasant one.
[the Prime Minister refuses to cancel the Belgium deal]
You've got to dance with them that brung ya. Of course that's a minor consideration once a Statesman makes his decision.
[upon seeing Solomon Gundy for the first time]
I could never live on an island.
Ottawa hasn't been bad to us! Ottawa's been GOOD to us! Ottawa's money is what kept our economy afloat all these years.
Ottawa's money is what's keeping *your* economy afloat. I FISH for a living!
Yeah, just because you think someday they'll give you a Senate seat, Dempster Milland, don't you go apologizing for a Government that gives the *rest of us* nothin' but hard times!

[in Flemish]
Tell the Prime Minister the deal is off!

[singing while skipping rope]
Born on Monday, Schooled on Tuesday, Married on Wednesday, Honeymoon Thursday, Works on Friday, Dead on Saturday, Buried on Sunday. That was the end of Solomon Gun-day.
Big pigs eat first.
